Verb *crawl*
*************

Documentation for the crawl verb in */cmds/verbs/crawl.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``crawl <preposition> <something>``
 |  ``i.e. crawl under bed``

Crawl somewhere where they will not find you. Ever.
